entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider adding a trimming Feature Switch for Http3Support #77420
  • Assert running System.Net.Sockets tests on macOS 13 #77416
  • Convert DllImport to LibraryImport takes a long time when processing many DllImports #77415
    8.0.0
  • SslStream_AllowRenegotiation_False_Throws fails in macOS 13 #77414
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a code generator to handle option validation #77412
    8.0.0
  • Improve XunitWrapper test runner #77410
  • SYSLIB1045 Use GeneratedRegex auto-correct causes CS0756 multiple defining declarations #77409
    8.0.0
  • DynamicRevocationTests fails on macOS 13 #77408
  • NativeAOT symbols are broken on linux when publishing Release #77407
    7.0.x
  • ExtendedProtectionPolicy constructor throws unnecessarily on WASM #77405
  • [API Proposal]: Make it easier to create quality ValidateOptionsResult instances #77404
    8.0.0
  • CI build failure: mono llvmfullaot linux x64 - No output #77403
  • [API Proposal]: Expand data validation attributes #77402
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Question about COMDAT and exception handling #77396
  • .Net 6/Win11 HttpClient HandshakeFailure TLS issue #77393
  • System.Collections work planned for .NET 8 #77391
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions work planned for .NET 8 #77390
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `dotnet-runtime-perf` - `System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory.` #77387
    8.0.0
  • [.NET 8] Mono workload doesn't import Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoAOTCompiler.Task #77385
    8.0.0
  • UseWindowsService reports a gracefull ServiceStop to SCM even in case of exception, so it's impossible to schedule a restart #77381
  • Entire indirect stores denormalize normalize-on-store locals #77379
    Future
  • Cms signature created with .Net Framework cannot be verified with .Net Core for an elliptic curve certificate #77377
  • Clarification about hdt_load_in_memory_assembly #77375
  • Set-AzKeyVaultSecret Socket Exception and timeout #77374
  • Buffered file stream doesn't flush data right #77373
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationErrorsException: Section or group name 'system.diagnostics' is already defined. #77369
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe is not obey .NET Standard 2.0 (it should support .NET Core 2.1 App) #77367
  • Restore failure due to `The process cannot access the file x because it is being used by another process` #77364
  • Test failure JIT\\Generics\\Exceptions\\general_class_instance01\\general_class_instance01.cmd #77363
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [Linux] System.DirectoryServices.Protocols is not supported on this platform #77022
  • PriorityQueue<TElement, TPriority> edge case Count out of sync #77212
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in Perf_String, Perf_Stringbuilder, other on 8/9/2022 #77064
  • VN based copy prop assertion when enabling debug #77380
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\StructABI\\StructABI\\StructABI.cmd #77362
  • [API Proposal]: Add http request/response correlation id to LoggingHttpMessageHandler (Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Logging) #76998
    Future
  • UTC Conversion of DateTime.MinValue for UTC-xy timezones return different results #77376
  • Assertion failure 0 <= fd && fd < sysconf(_SC_OPEN_MAX) in System.Net.Mail.Functional.Tests #72830
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnly empty collection singletons #76028
    8.0.0
  • ObjWriter duplicates sections in COFF output #77257

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding Readme.md for DirectoryServices.Protocols and Regex libraries #77418
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [wasm] Run debugger tests with one work item per test class #77417
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • README for extensions libraries #77413
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix OCSP test responder to omit fractional seconds #77411
    area-System.Security
  • [Mono] Disable SIMD intrinsics for Vector128/64 on Arm64 #77406
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add README docs for XML libraries #77401
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • Remove custom Utf8 encoder implementation #77400
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Slightly improve string unrolling for length 5 and 6 #77398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add `IMemoryView` as exported type #77397
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Use u8 in Utf8Formatter date formatting #77395
  • Consolidate the `GUID` to string logic #77394
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix regression when serializing untyped polymorphic root-level custom converters. #77388
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.1
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [FileStream] Flush(flushToDisk: true) should always flush to disk #77384
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [MONO][Marshal] Fix race condition in marshal callback installation #77383
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] Revert "Override ReadAsync and WriteAsync methods on ConsoleStream." #77382
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Console, 7.0.x
  • [WIP] Issue 47202 #77370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger][documenatation] Debugging library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Merged

  • SPMI: More information on CI failures #77361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix reported PriorityQueue issue. #77229
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Detriplicate internal SingleProducerSingleConsumerQueue #76932
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix copy propagation dump #77389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold primitive-typed access to promoted structs in local morph and forbid mismatched struct assignments #76766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add `IMemoryView` as exported type #77371
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Update def flags in `gtCloneExpr` #77378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix comment #77226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Override ReadAsync and WriteAsync methods on ConsoleStream." #77360
    area-System.Console
  • SPMI: Fix repPrintObjectDescription and repGetStringLiteral #77372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SmtpClientTest Assertion Fail Fix #76361
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Add ReadOnly{Observable}Collection/Dictionary.Empty #76764
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Temporary instrumentation for #76280 #77365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [JIT] x86/x64 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • Move linker to runtime #77149
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection: allow non-ASCII Passwords on Linux Systems #77223
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}h{Pre,Post}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Enable multi-reg `LONG` nodes on 32 bit #76263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold full-width SIMD-typed indirections #76745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not set flags for JTRUE op1 #76731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consecutive registers #77072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Update mask for lookup of `this` in CCW `ComWrappers` scenario #77302
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Handle GT_IND in optVNConstantPropCurStmt #77105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete a bit more `OBJ(ADDR(...))` wrapping from `impNormStructVal` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce `FIELD_ADDR` and use it for TLS statics and instance class fields #77353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make Type.IsEnum an intrinsic #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix unzipping 4GB+ zip files #77181
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Split and simplify `fgMorphOneAsgBlockOp` #76793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add DiagnosticSource.Write<T> API to assist with trimming #76395
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome for testing #77133
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement Array.Initialize in C# #77336
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Implement Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77355
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix documentation for INumberBase IsComplex and IsImaginary #77330
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT runtime generic methods test #77079
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System.Runtime.Intrinsics #76687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Allow some intrinsics in Tier0 (e.g. Enum.HasFlag) #77357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Improve total L2 size calculation logic on osx-arm64 #75881
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: implement tail merging #77103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Detect specifical character in EnumConverter.cs #76873
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable emitting Vector64 SIMD intrinsics on Amd64 #77320
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Lazily instantiate JsonSerializerOptions.Converters #77219
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Simplify type info resolver assignment #76275
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Clean up converter initialization logic. #77290
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Removing empty variable live ranges when possible #77289
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid checking for exceptions after calls to Math icalls. #77347
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fixed cross-build for clang-9 #77245
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Convert Array icalls to use ObjectHandleOnStack. #77343
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Move usages of `COMPlus_` var to `DOTNET_` fallback #77239
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold static readonly struct X = <zero> to a jit-time const, e.g. Guid.Empty #77354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: DateTime alignment for wasm32. 4 or 8 ? #2055

PullRequests

Merged

  • Flow the execution context into a green thread #2054
    area-green-threads
  • Instrument Socket for green threads #2021
  • Instrument RandomAccess.Read/Write for green threads #2020

Updated

  • Transition to os thread on pinvoke #2053
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnablePackageValidation reports CP1003 when multitargeting windows lib #28746
  • Found multiple publish output files when using .dll.config in referenced library. #28742
  • TrimmerRootDescriptor items are not handled correctly for incremental build #28740

Closed

  • Massive workflow problems #28237
  • Cannot list xunit tests using a filter #26638
  • .NET 6 Test Project with CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies = false fails running tests #27154
  • dotnet test sometimes hangs in a VM #27737

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Arcade to Use svc providers - release/6.0.3xx branch #28745
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Arcade to Use svc providers - release/6.0.1xx branch #28744
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Cherrypick main->7.0.2xx] Create workloads enumerator lazily in dotnet-new host #28736
    Area-dotnet new

Merged

  • Use latest docker containers #28422
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create workloads enumerator lazily in dotnet-new host #28677
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • Introduce PublishSelfContained #28714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use implicit package reference for ILC build package #28690
    Area-ILLink
  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update current TFM #28715
    Area-ILLink
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2028440 #28689
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28668
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    Area-Common templates

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Change ref safety errors to warnings in unsafe contexts #6476
    Working Set
  • Champion "Async Streams" (including async disposable) (16.3, Core 3) #43
    8.0
  • Championed: Target-typed implicit array creation expression `new[]` #2701
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make `Path.GetTempPath()` a banned API in the compiler codebase #64949
    17.5
  • IDE0004 unhelpful suggestions #64945
  • "Add Parameter" dialog does not recognize generic method parameter types in tuple types #64938
  • [LSP] Multiline extract method acts as if only single line selected #64934
    Backlog
  • dotnet_sort_system_directives_first no longer respected for Microsoft.* namespaces in latest VS 17.4.0 Preview #64930

Closed

  • Clear build-only diagnostics in the error list for edited documents #64659
    17.5 P1
  • Variable names suggestion #64669
  • Auto add using as global #64443
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33024.198 #64943
  • Confusing behavior of "Go to definition", "Peek definition" and "Go to implementation" with partial methods #64615
    17.5
  • LSIF generation uses inVs on invalid nodes #63841
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Update 17.4 version to preview 6 #64953
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add highly parallel test to ensure pinning/syncing/streaming results is safe. #64951
    Area-IDE
  • Use -Svc pool providers for release/ branch builds #64950
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add A/B flag to test removing recoverable assembly-metadata in VS. #64948
    Area-IDE
  • Reverting Code Index ingestion #64946
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Cleanup VS reference manager a bit #64944
    Area-IDE
  • Synthesize some delegate parameter attributes #64932
    Area-Compilers
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Add back async streaming of results for NavTo (part2) #64896
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • Update config for snap #64952
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Throw in unsupported Tag api #64937
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64942
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.5 P1
  • Remove unused WeaklyCachedValueSource type #64941
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • Add missing error to CSharpUpgradeProjectCodeFixProvider #64940
    Area-IDE, Community, 17.5 P1
  • Remove 'ConstantValueSource' #64939
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • Unify Peek behavior with GoToDef #64936
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64935
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.5 P1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.5 P1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64914
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.5 P1
  • Get binlog on constructor failure #64899
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.5 P1
  • Implement equality semantics for async tagger tags. (take2) #64895
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • Clear build-only diagnostics in the document after document edit #64885
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • Expose a way to change the document service provider to Razor #64884
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • Only write out inVs properties when appropriate #64853
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • Verify the error type and span only for error tag #64852
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.5 P1

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #64955
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64956
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add back async streaming of results for DesignerAttributes (part2) #64908
    Area-IDE
  • Remove project-cache-service #64880
    Area-IDE
  • Support caller info and nullability attributes in lambdas #64823
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref safety analysis should take into consideration defensive copy of a call receiver performed by IL gen. #64890
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow and emit `params` arrays in lambdas #64861
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid having to take locks repeatedly when cleaning out workspace #62986
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data"" #64892
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - while snippet #64893
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Suppress IOperation validation for lambda parameter initializers #64630
    Area-Compilers
  • Track local constant usage in attributes applied to local methods or lambdas #64773
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Document how to automatically refresh the browser when the Blazor Server connection is lost #44715
  • Authorization user role is case sensitive #44713
  • Update the documentation about the templates on learn.microsoft.com for .NET 7 #44712
    8.0-MQ
  • Launch Without Debugging Doesn't Block BackgroundService and Whole App but Debug Does #44706

Closed

  • Blazor MSAL - Login Does not Redirect if Body Wrapped in Authorize View in Layout #44704
  • Disconnected SignalR implementation for ServerSide Blazor #25415
    Backlog
  • Need to click button twice to update InputTextArea when EditForm's Model is bound to the same thing #25326
    Backlog
  • ControllerBase.User.Identity is null for all users after a period of time #25313
    Backlog
  • Improve usability when using uncaptured iteration variables in Blazor bindings #25252
    Backlog
  • How to clear the Editform validation messages with a button click in Blazor #24563
    Backlog
  • Blazor Server app display different between F5 and Ctrl+F5 #44632
  • Changing the date / time format reflect to the CurrentCulture all the time #44286
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor ComponentBase.SetParametersAsync(ParameterView.Empty) still create costly WriterForType despite ParameterView.Empty #44693
  • In custom middleware, there are no route data values #44554
  • "Specified argument was out of the range of valid values." exception when request url starts with a dot #19641
    8.0-preview1
  • Http.Sys response header serialization allocations #40215
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44719
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Backport 'Fix Blazor RemoteAuthenticatorView processing the same action multiple times' #44718
    area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44717
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • Update SDK #44601
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Improved the docs for the RedisCacheOptions.InstanceName property #44711
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Improve StringBuilder usage #44691
    Perf, 8.0-preview1
  • Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44688
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Remove some `GCHandle`s from `SendHeaders()` #44561
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, 8.0-preview1
  • Reference ConnectionId always using same casing in log messages #44705
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Remove temporary allocations from Identity #44557
    Perf, area-identity, 8.0-preview1
  • Use IndexOfAny(char, char) when possible #44687
    Perf, 8.0-preview1
  • Add option to use system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a9b2f04` to `e07617d` #44709
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `f268fbf` to `6a0e1ae` #44708
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fixed bug #19641 Routing ArgumentOutOfRangeException #44674
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Raise field size limit to 32kb #44689
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Send 431 when HTTP/2&3 headers are too large or many #44668
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2028555 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Blazor Server - Auto reconnect on mobile browsers #44700
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • fix trace id value, introduce traceparent #44680
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • !eeheap is reporting slightly inaccurate committed bytes. #3482

PullRequests

Merged

  • Optimize eeheap presentation for regions #3462
    sos

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IsFocused does not return to false when a Datepicker looses focus in iOS #10875
  • Failed to verify code signature #10874
  • TemplateBinding of custom control dependency properties does not get applied when style is imported from App.xaml #10873
  • AAB-files get signed, but not APK-files #10872
  • clang linker error after including Microsoft.Data.SqlClient nuget in project #10870
  • Java.Lang.NullPointerException: boolean android.view.View.isInLayout() #10867
  • [Enhancement] VisibleViews property for CollectionView #10866
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] Grid : ActualWidth for ColumnDefinition And ActualHeight properties for RowDefinition #10864
    Backlog
  • [Android] Keyboard is not dismissed after tapping "Enter" #10858
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] Add Scroll Status property to ItemsViewScrolledEventArgs (CarouselView, CollectionView) #10857
    Backlog

Closed

  • Cannot update WebView2 UserDataFolder in BlazorWebView for Windows Forms #10772
  • Backbutton currently doesn't pop modal page if root page isn't a NavigationPage #10877
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Sync blazorserver & blazor-maui templates #7868
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: 'View with id -1: crc640ec207abc449b2ca.ShellPageContainer#onMeasure() did not set the measured dimension by calling setMeasuredDimension()' #10776
  • A Simple new MAUI Project crashes when use Hot Restart with iPhone 7 Plus #10849
  • iOS app crashes on device when pasting into Entry #10854
  • Bug with WebView #10246
    Backlog
  • .net 7 android compiler error (Java) #10802

PullRequests

Created

  • Add NeedsExactMeasure check for Editor on Android #10876
  • Update .NET 6 workload version to 6.0.545 #10871
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22518.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22521.1 #10863
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • iOS 13 devices do not allow status bar access #10855
  • [Tizen] Update to Tizen 7.0.100 stable #10861

Updated

  • Fix more inline API docs #10785
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Run Android tests on background thread #10841
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • Fix Windows CollectionView EmptyView alignment #10845
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Fix minimum sizing for * cells with multiple children #10836
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: property with converter which handles nulls, can/will give wrong results when compared to null #29416
  • Projects targeting .NET Framework 4.6.1 #29415
  • ManyServiceProvidersCreatedWarning #29412
  • AsSplitQuery for specified collection #29411

Closed

  • Porting EF6 to EF Core: error "The LINQ expression could not be translated" reported in lots of queries #29404
  • JSON/Query: don't print JSON_QUERY calls when we extract the entire aggregate #29289
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #29289 - don't print JSON_QUERY calls when we extract the entire aggregate #29407
    auto-merge
